description.value: Moderate Curse: Casandalee attempts to bring you unwanted intellectual advancement to help you become something better. Each day, at some point during the day, Casandalee bestows a strange insight upon you that you find uncomfortable. If you embrace it, you aren't otherwise affected, but if you don't, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] for 10 minutes.
